<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Lymnieris (The Auroral Tower)](/Deities.aspx?ID=124)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Help others achieve their desires, aid and protect sex workers, help others through difficult transitions

**Anathema** Persecute sex workers, force or support unwanted marriages

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)

**Favored Weapon** [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=40), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=49)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Mage Armor](/Spells.aspx?ID=176)

- **3rd**
[Threefold Aspect](/Spells.aspx?ID=723)

- **4th**
[Resilient Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=255)

</column>
name: Lymnieris (The Auroral Tower)
